content: June 22 United Continental Holdings Inc  said on Monday it expects to take delivery of two used Boeing Co  737-700 aircraft this month  which were formerly operated by Copa Holdings SA's Copa Airlines.
name: Copa Holdings SA
title: United Airlines to add two used Boeing planes to fleet in June
